mapper.select: select row_number() over(order by c.cartNO desc) as num, c.CARTNO, c.MNO, c.gNO, c.CARTSTOCK, c.CARTDATE, g.gNAME, g.gPRICE, g.gImg from cart c inner join goods g on c.gNo = g.gNo where c.mNo = #{mNo}
mapper.delete: delete cart where cartNo = #{cartNo} and mNo = #{mNo}
mapper.insert: insert into order_details(orderDetailsNum, orderId, gNo, cartStock) select order_details_seq.nextval, #{orderId}, gNo, cartStock from cart
mapper.select: select orderId, mNo, orderName, orderAddr1, orderAddr2, orderAddr3, orderPhone, amount, orderDate, gNo from goodsorder where mNo = #{mNo}

select distinct o.orderId, o.mno, o.orderName, o.orderaddr1, o.orderaddr2, o.orderaddr3, o.orderphone, o.amount, o.orderDate, o.gno, o.GREVIEWSTATUS, d.orderDetailsNum, d.gno, d.cartStock, g.gName, g.gImg, g.gPrice
from goodsorder o inner join order_Details d on o.orderId = d.orderId inner join goods g on d.gNo = g.gNo where o.mno = #{mNo} and o.orderId = #{orderId}
